name: collateralClaimedQuantity
description: Quantity of collateral claimed by the lender.

name: collateralClaimedValue
description: USD value of the collateral claimed by the lender (at the time of claiming)

name: collateralDeposited
description:
The current quantity of the collateral token that is deposited.

As the loan is repaid, this will decrease.

name: collateralIncome
description:
USD value of the income recognised from claiming the loan's collateral.

As collateral is returned to the borrower as they repay the loan principal, the collateral at any point in time covers the principal outstanding.

The income is therefore calculated as:

collateralValueAtClaim - principalOutstanding

name: createdTimestamp
description: Timestamp of the loan creation, in seconds

name: expiryTimestamp
description: Timestamp of the expected loan expiry, in seconds

name: id
description:
Loan id unique across the clearinghouse and its coolers

Format: cooler-loanId

name: interest
description:
The total interest charged on the loan.

When the loan is extended, this number will be increased.

name: interestPaid
description:
Cumulative interest paid on the loan.

Any outstanding interest is paid first, followed by principal.

name: interestRate
description:
The interest rate, stored as a decimal.

e.g. 0.5% = 0.005

name: loanId
description: Loan id unique to the cooler

name: principal
description: The loan principal. Will not change after loan creation.

name: principalPaid
description: Cumulative principal paid on the loan.

name: secondsToExpiry
description: The number of seconds until the loan expires.

name: snapshotDate
description:
Date of the snapshot.

Times are stored at UTC.
